long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate UTM tags with ease.

Welcome to our pizzalicious UTM tag generator, hand-crafted for Google Analytics 4 (GA4)! Say arrivederci to boring tag creation processes and hello to our hot and fresh solution makes generating tags a breeze, leaving you with more time to enjoy a slice of success. üçïüöÄ

‚óè Quick and easy right-click integration for instant tagging.
‚óè Customizable fields to tailor your tags to your specific needs.
‚óè Seamless clipboard integration for effortless sharing and tracking.
‚óè Intuitive interface designed for marketers, by marketers.

-- How does it work? 

To use this extension, just right click on the highlighted text or link you want to track, then click "Create UTM", and voil√†! You're ready to start generating your GA4 UTM tag.

You can also launch the extension using the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Shift+D (or Cmd+Shift+D on Mac). Additionally, there is an option to "Close after copying" which will close the UTM window after your tag has saved to your clipboard.

We've got your back! Say goodbye to repetitive typing. We save your last entered data, so you don't have to start from scratch. Plus, every new right-click automatically replaces the website URL, making your workflow smoother than ever.

-- Who is this for?
Digital marketers, advertisers, social media managers, online shop owners, or anyone needing to track a link in Google Analytics.

*Planned features*
Keyboard Shortcut.
Saving Profiles for frequently used data.
